channel.title: CVE Feed for sebhildebrandt -- systeminformation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sebhildebrandt -- systeminformation

item.title: CVE-2020-26300|2024-08-04T15:56:03.706Z -- sebhildebrandt -- systeminformation
item.description: systeminformation is an npm package that provides system and OS information library for node.js. In systeminformation before version 4.26.2 there is a command injection vulnerability. Problem was fixed in version 4.26.2 with a shell string sanitation fix.

item.title: CVE-2020-26274|2024-08-04T15:56:03.939Z -- sebhildebrandt -- systeminformation
item.description: In systeminformation (npm package) before version 4.31.1 there is a command injection vulnerability. The problem was fixed in version 4.31.1 with a shell string sanitation fix.

item.title: CVE-2020-26245|2024-08-04T15:56:03.692Z -- sebhildebrandt -- systeminformation
item.description: npm package systeminformation before version 4.30.5 is vulnerable to Prototype Pollution leading to Command Injection. The issue was fixed with a rewrite of shell sanitations to avoid prototyper pollution problems. The issue is fixed in version 4.30.5. If you cannot upgrade, be sure to check or sanitize service parameter strings that are passed to si.inetChecksite().
